creator: james.velasco@int.com
text:
When javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse( int code, String message ) is invoked, the message argument is omitted from the corresponding Status-Line's Reason-Phrase as was the case in Tomcat 5.5.26 and earlier.

While not explicitly required, Section 6.1.1 of http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2616.txt strongly implies this to be the correct behavior, as implemented in v 5.5.26.

I got it, this is a security fix. Thanks for the response.

James
creator: james.velasco@int.com
